alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 1:52PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Yavapai County through 230 PM MST... At 150 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wagoner just west of Crown King, or 23 miles northeast of Wickenburg, slowly moving south at 5 to 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, up to half inch hail, and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crown King, Wagoner and Walnut Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
